forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 49F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 53F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening wind and rain. Low near 5C. WSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 41F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 48F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Thunder possible. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Thunder possible. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with the chance of some thunder in the morning, then skies turning partly cloudy late. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with the chance of some thunder in the morning, then skies turning partly cloudy late. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low near 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
